title: When will the last remaining house that sits on the future Publix site on the corner of Middle Sound & Market St be removed & what is the hold up?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/09/when-will-the-last-remaining-house-that-sits-on-the-future-ogden-publix-site-be-removed-and-what-is-the-hold-up/
